import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from "axios"; export default class BannerEdit extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state= { hasError: false, url: {} } } componentDidCatch() { fetch('') .then(res => res.json) .then(res => this.setState({ url:res })) .catch( () => this.setState({ hasError: true })) } render() { return (
ชื่อรูปภาพ
) } }
